doc:
Howard McNear https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_McNear 0 Howard Terbell McNear (January 27, 1905 – January 3, 1969) was an American stage, screen, and radio character actor. McNear is best remembered as Floyd Lawson, the barber in The Andy Griffith Show (1960-1968). Howard_Terbell_McNear ( January_27_,_1905 – January_3_,_1969 ) was an_American_stage , screen , and radio_character_actor . McNear is_best_remembered as Floyd_Lawson , the_barber in The_Andy_Griffith_Show_(_1960-1968_) .
